english.segment1: Everyone I know. Needs love like drugs. Like a common cold. We could never shrug
english.segment2: My baby and me. We're missing the same stuff. We've all got a disease. Deficiency of love
english.segment3: Every day we still try. Every night we still cry. Driving home on the 805
english.segment4: We don't know what we're doing. We do it again. We're just amateur lovers. With amateur friends
english.segment5: I can tell you what you're thinking now. Before you think that you can settle down
english.segment6: We don't know what we're doing. Let's do it again
english.segment7: You tried to play it down. But it never stuck. I tried to build this town. I'm getting no such luck. When nobody's around. I keep my eyes on the clock. There ain't a cure I've found. In all my times around this block
english.segment8: Everyday we still try. Every night we still cry. Driving home on the 405
english.segment9: We don't know what we're doing. We do it again. We're just amateur lovers. With amateur friends
english.segment10: I can tell you what you're thinking now. Before you think that you can settle down. We don't know what we're doing. Let's do it again
english.segment11: We don't know what we're doing. Let's do it again. We're just amateur lovers. With amateur friends
english.segment12: I can tell you what you're thinking now. Before you think that you can settle down. Our lovin' isn't gonna burn us out
english.segment13: We don't know what we're doing. Let's do it again
